bibl.title: Investigación sobre el Egipto greco-romano y tardoantiguo. Avec résumés en espagnol et en anglais.
bibl.note: This article presents the research activity of the author in the field of Late Antiquity, including her work in Greek and Coptic papyrology and on linguistic contact in Egypt.
bibl.seg: Torallas Tovar Sofía, Investigación sobre el Egipto greco-romano y tardoantiguo. Avec résumés en espagnol et en anglais.
This article presents the research activity of the author in the field of Late Antiquity, including her work in Greek and Coptic papyrology and on linguistic contact in Egypt.
